title: 10 Steps to Have Happy Teeth
description: Cayolla's baby teeth explain in this 10 steps guide how to achieve happy and healthy teeth! Taking care of our teeth start since we are little, that's why I created this guide for YOU AND YOUR FAMILY! I want you to start creating healthy and great habits in taking care your mouth and your general health. We need to start at home to spread love and happiness! If your teeth are happy, you will always smile and when you smile the world will be a better place to live in! So, spread the love of loving your teeth! Hope you enjoy this guide that I made with all my love. Thank you!
author: Tamara Arauz
